title: Ticket #7713: No infinite sleep jobs in the test suite
description:
I recently discovered that some of the macs in the batlab were bogged down with dozens of infinite sleep jobs from old test suite runs: x_sleep.pl 0. These sleep jobs should last for an hour at most.

We should try to determine how these processes were leaked, but not at the expense of these permanent lingerers.
